participant_1.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i have been traveling the world for a years. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

content.text: How are you doing? Where are you from?
